about.title: About Me
about.content: Interested in electronics & programming, love to take things apart and explore. Prefer the process and results over titles.

lyrify_translator.name: Lyrify Translator
lyrify_translator.desc: A translation tool based on LLM, supporting multi-language translation with multiple engines.

lyrify_expand.name: Lyrify expand
lyrify_expand.desc: Reverse proxy node for Lyrify Translator.
